desc.en: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.jp: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.thai: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.ko: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜和三一是死對頭。這兩間學校真的能和解嗎？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 格黑娜和三一是死对头。这两间学校真的能和解吗？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜和三一是死对头。这两间学校真的能和解吗？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜和三一是死对头。这两间学校真的能和解吗？

name.en: Chapter 1 - Make-Up Work Club, Here We Go!
name.jp: Chapter 1 - Make-Up Work Club, Here We Go!
name.thai: Chapter 1 - Make-Up Work Club, Here We Go!
name.ko: Chapter 1 - Make-Up Work Club, Here We Go!

desc.en: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.jp: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.thai: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.ko: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.zh_tw: 四名三一的學生即將被留級。請成為指引她們的「補課部」班導師，將她們 從危機中解救出來吧！
desc.zh_cn_jp: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！
desc.zh_cn_tw: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！
desc.zh_cn_cn: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！

name.zh_tw: 第二章-無法證明的難題
name.zh_cn_jp: 第二章-无法证明的难题
name.zh_cn_tw: 第二章-无法证明的难题
name.zh_cn_cn: 第二章-无法证明的难题

desc.en: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?
desc.jp: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?
desc.thai: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?
desc.ko: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?
desc.zh_tw: 在這個陰謀、懷疑及背叛交織的黑暗中，補課部的學生們能平安度過這場危機嗎？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在这个阴谋、怀疑与背叛交际的黑暗中，补课部的学生们能平安度过这场危机吗？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在这个阴谋、怀疑与背叛交际的黑暗中，补课部的学生们能平安度过这场危机吗？

desc.en: 终于迎来了伊甸园条约签字仪式的当天。看似和平的日常生活出现了裂缝，混乱与憎恶的入侵正在加速。最终收束的目的地将会是“破局”，还是——

desc.en: 被自己所属的学院抛弃的奥利斯小队——徘徊于憎恶与愤怒之间的她们，真的存在着慈悲吗？
